marklogic.body: That is the most racist piece of crap I have read in a long time, void of facts. I also believe the Hispanic is smarter than believe that crap. This is straight from the DNC playbook or Alinski manual. Is there a problem that has to be with illegals from all over, YES but there is no problem with Hispanic people. In a simple statement, 'Obama's reelection is in trouble, create a non issue to take the Spot light Off his miserable record on jobs and energy prices.'
